document.full_text: nbc has picked up the musical comedy "smash," about the making of a broadway show, for the 2011-12 television season.
document.title: curtain up: broadway-set 'smash' gets a spot on nbc's roster
lines_and_colors: nbc has picked up the musical comedy "smash," about the making of a broadway show, for the 2011-12 television season.
